name: Pattern Making
description: Creation of precise garment patterns based on design specifications, ensuring accurate fit and style for mass production.

name: Fabric Sourcing
description: Procurement of high-quality fabrics and materials from reliable suppliers to meet the specific needs of each garment production project.

name: Cutting and Sewing
description: Professional cutting and sewing services using advanced machinery to ensure precise and efficient garment assembly.

name: Quality Control
description: Comprehensive quality control checks at various stages of production to ensure garments meet the required standards and specifications.

name: Embellishment and Printing
description: Application of decorative elements such as embroidery, screen printing, and heat transfers to enhance garment designs.

name: Packaging and Distribution
description: Efficient packaging of finished garments and coordination of logistics for timely delivery to retailers, wholesalers, or direct consumers.
